title: [经济|娱乐|机械]MoneyThief——杀死怪物/玩家可以获得金币咯！[1.8-1.9]
author: CJ帝
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 08:11 编辑 

我今天搬运的第三个插件了！！希望大家支持我，本英文渣会继续为大家搬运的！{:10_492:}

描述：
这款插件实现了从击杀玩家/怪物上获取预配置好的钱的功能。（意译） This plugin implements the ability to a configurable amount of money from another player after you kill them. You can also get paid for killing mobs.
注意：
1. 钱是从被杀死的玩家身上转移到杀死的人身上
2.为了平衡，获得钱的数量基于受害者的百分比
3.受害者一定比例的钱将全部消失（感觉翻译的不对）
4.玩家也可以通过杀怪挣钱
5.杀死不同怪物可以获得不同的钱
6.从被杀死的玩家身上获得的百分比的钱将永远消失，并且杀死不同怪物获得的钱的数量可以在配置文件中修改
7.在杀死一个怪物或玩家后，你将听到一个“customizable”的声音
E文对照：（有翻译的不对的自己对比下，我都是意译）

FeaturesMoney is taking from the victim, and given to the killerThe amount of money taken is based on a percentage of the victim's balanceA percentage of the victim's money is lost altogether.Players can also make money by killing mobsEach mob can have a different value associated with them.The percentage of money stolen from the victim, percentage of money lost forever, and value of each mob is configurable in the config fileUpon killing a mob/player, or dying from a player, you will hear a customizable fanfare play.
指令&权限：
/moneythief reloadconfig - 重载插件/moneythief worth - 展示怪物清单与杀死他们获得的金钱/moneythief v - 插件版本查询
权限：

moneythief.reloadconfigmoneythief.worth

这两个是以前的，其他的如下：（These two are for the previous commands. The rest are as follow）
moneythief.PVE - 杀怪得钱
moneythief.PVP - 杀人得钱
moneythief.bypassPVP - （不会翻译！！）If you have this, you will not activate the PVP event upon your death. You keep you money!
下载地址：

都在上面的下载地址上了！去官网下载吧，也是对作者的一种支持！
